attributes.action:
Remove Teresa May from power.
War is not acceptable.
attributes.background:
Teresa May is no longer fit to rule the country. 
It is unacceptable to commit our armed forces to Syria.
All faith has been lost in the PM.
She should be force to step down.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be removed from office. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217290
